    "number": 191132,
    "data": "1,4,13,40,49,121,148,157,193,364,445,472,481,580,589,625,769,1093,1336,1417,1444,1453,1741,1768,1777,1876,1885,1921,2308,2317,2353,2497,3073,3280,4009,4252,4333,4360,4369,5224,5305,5332,5341,5629,5656,5665,5764,5773,5809,6925,6952,6961,7060,7069,7105,7492,7501",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x+1 and 4x-3 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A191113."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191132/b191132.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = 1; j = 4; k = -3; f = 1; g = 9;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]   (* A191132 *)",
        "b = (a - 1)/3; c = (a + 3)/4; r = Range[1, 2500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191188 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191189 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191132 n = a191132_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191132_list = 1 : f (singleton 4)",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m+1) $ insert (4*m-3) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 27 2011",
    "references": 3,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:10-04:00",
